definition:
Let $V$ be a real hilbert space (and thus an inner product space), and
let $f$ be a continuous linear functional on $V$. Then $f$ has an
associated quadratic function $\varphi:V\to{\mathbbmss{R}}$ given by
$$\varphi(v)=\frac{1}{2}\|v\|^2-f(v)$$
phrase: Quadratic Function Associated With A Linear Functional
